version_description:
• Awesome new design
• Original Mad Libs soundtrack and audio effects, available for the very first time
• Exclusive illustrations for each of the 30+ books, only available within the app
• All new stickers and badges to collect
• Updated interface and gestures to make play easier and faster
• COPPA compliance for a child-safe product

• Awesome new design
• Original Mad Libs soundtrack and audio effects, available for the very first time
• Exclusive illustrations for each of the 30+ books, only available within the app
• All new stickers and badges to collect
• Updated interface and gestures to make play easier and faster
• COPPA compliance for a child-safe product

Have you played the game everyone’s talking about?

Are you Goofy or Cool? Do you like Pirates or are you Totally Pink? Would you rather go to a Sleepover or Outer Space? All of these great Mad Libs and more are available to purchase in the app!

Explore all-new WWE Mad Libs, Hello Kitty Mad Libs, and Family Guy Mad Libs!

We’ve also made bug fixes and performance improvements for smoother and wackier gameplay.

Have you played the game everyone’s talking about?

Are you Goofy or Cool? Do you like Pirates or are you Totally Pink? Would you rather go to a Sleepover or Outer Space? All of these great Mad Libs and more are available to purchase in the app!

Explore all-new WWE Mad Libs, Hello Kitty Mad Libs, and Family Guy Mad Libs!

We’ve also made bug fixes and performance improvements for smoother and wackier gameplay.

We’ve made it easier than ever before to find the weird and wacky Mad Libs stories you love!

While you’re there, check out Diary of a Wimpy Kid Mad Libs (coming soon!) and our other awesome branded Mad Libs: WWE, Hello Kitty, and Family Guy!

And of course we’ve made bug fixes to improve performance (isn’t that what everyone does?)!

We’ve made it easier than ever before to find the weird and wacky Mad Libs stories you love!

While you’re there, check out Diary of a Wimpy Kid Mad Libs (coming soon!) and our other awesome branded Mad Libs: WWE, Hello Kitty, and Family Guy!

And of course we’ve made bug fixes to improve performance (isn’t that what everyone does?)!

New FREE STORIES in time for summer!
Mad Libs is hitting the road, going from coast to coast, to find America’s Favorite Adjective! Share your favorite adjective to join in on the fun!

And more new content coming soon—happy holidays from the Mad Libs team!

Thanks for your patience as we worked through some bugs—Mad Libs should be running smoothly again, so you can get back to creating the world's wackiest stories with your friends and families!
